resources.string: Oops! There is no connectivity!\nPlease make sure you have an internet connection.
Oops! There was a wrong response from web request!\nPlease restart the activity and make sure you have an internet connection.
Oops! Something went wrong!\nThe developer should correct this! Please report this to him.
Oops! Could not load recipes from local database!\nPlease reinstall the application and try again.\nSorry for the inconvenience :(
